attributes.action: Amend Regulation 66 of The Local Government Pension Scheme Regulations 1997
attributes.additional_details:
The regulations has not taken into account Equality Act 2010 protected characteristics of employees under 'age discrimination or ageism'. 

Reference to the age 50 prevents employees who have not reached 50 the opportunity to use their Additional Voluntary Contributions they have paid or accumulated over years of employment to purchase additional years of service when considering early or flexible retirement.
attributes.background: Remove reference to the age 50 in the regulations https://lgpsregs.org/timelineregs/Amended/SI20011481/pt3ch4.html#Reg66

rejection.details: This regulation has already been revoked by the Local Government Pension Scheme (Transitional Provisions) Regulations 2008 (SI 2008 No. 238) (https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2008/238/contents/made).
